page.title: 07MY DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: I am wakened at 7.45a.m. by my Mum who has to go to work.I go downstairs and eat a bowl of cornflakes and some toast.Then I go to the bathroom to wash and clean my teeth.I change into my grey school skirt and white blouse and brush my hair.I check my homework is in my schoolbag.Around 8.45a.m. I leave for school,meeting my friend on the way.Before school starts we all chat in the playground about previous evening's television programmes.In school we usually have a discussion first and then we do maths.At break-time we play skipping.After break we do language and reading.We play outside for the first half hour of lunch-break and then come in to have lunch e.g.haggis,potatoes and turnips,then sponge pudding and custard.In the afternoon we do project work and sometimes P.E. We always have
